Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore scored off the post with only 38 seconds on the clock.
Harry Wilson thumped a long-range strike into the net to give Wales a two-goal lead in just two minutes.
Driton Camaj pulled one back for Montenegro in the second half, but it was too little, too late.

Miscellaneous Highlights: The game played out in driving rain.
